p: Antioxidant activity is a complex process and is the sum of several mechanisms, such as free radical scavenging and reducing capacity [ 38]. In Figure 3, the essential oils from all four species of Schisandra presented high free radical scavenging and low reducing capacity. There were significant differences among the free radical scavenging activities of four species, while it was kept at a constant level with a continuous increase in concentration, and their 50% scavenging capacity (EC 50) values are listed in Table 3. VC and VE were the positive control.
